author: ansgar.eth
content:
action items from ACDE (sorry about the delay):
- <@412614104222531604> confirm decision on removing named forks after Prague from the blob schedule in the genesis files. see <#688075293562503241>
- clients: look into BALs metrics support, check with <@564345498471759890>
- <@968526635735326741> look into whether EIP-2926 should be included in repricings meta EIP
- (implicit action item) <@415548822983278593> merge PRs to add PFI EIPs to Glamsterdam meta EIP
